infos.value: Mont... What on earth are you doing?
I don't think I can tolerate waiting any longer.
Just as I thought. Here you are.
You should return to the castle tower. The evening wind weakens the strongest amongst us.
It's said that Mont is the elder prince of Leonis.
Indeed he is. What of it?
Mont would cease being a prince should the kingdom fall.
Is there not a trace of a filial bond between you?
No father wouldn't wish for the safe return of his child. But alas...
One cannot expect to fulfill his duty as guardian if he allows his heart to waver by dwelling on such things.
His duty as a...guardian? Whatever do you mean?
It is none of your concern.
After all, Mont's return to the castle is not guaranteed.
